about_the_game:
Start your 2 stroke engines and prepare to bathe in the pixelated blood of the unholy hordes!

What is Carnage Kart X?

Carnage Kart X™ is a retro-inspired Hack n' Slash n' Karting game combining hand-drawn 2D pixel art and 3D gameplay like it's 1996! Use your weapons and driving skill as a Knight of the Kart to survive swarms of fiendish ghouls and horrendous horrors who would like nothing more than to see you join the ranks of the dead!

Endure 15 minutes in each stage if you can while taking on challenges to swell your coffers and increase your chances at bonus bullion! Use your weapons and mechanics to drift, grind, boost, and slaughter your way around the stages!

Old School Kart Racing!

Live long enough to unlock the final challenge, a classic kart race with the area boss and their wretched underlings! Put them in their place, preferably while staying in 1st, and earn the maximum amount of Gold and Soul Shards used for unlocking new weapons, sub-weapons, and upgrading your kart stats!

So adjust thine helm, choose thine armament, gauntlets at 10 and 2, and prepare thyself for battle in the best game to ever put a sword on a go-kart!
